title: Outdoor Exercise Terrace with Spin Bikes, Bar Seating
posting_body: Come discover a remarkable urban lifestyle in the heart of Mountain View.
An indulgent collection of thoughtful resort-style amenities gives you comfortable places to unwind and recharge, no matter what time of the day.
Enjoy a quiet moment alone, or gather with friends and socialize.
Use this link for more info:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 693 Sq.
- Stainless Steel GE ENERGY STAR Appliances
- Bedroom Ceiling Fans and Ample Closet Space
- Expansive Windows and Abundant Natural Light
- Beautiful Wood-style Flooring throughout Main Living Areas
- Moveable Kitchen Island on Wheels in Most Residences
- Outdoor Exercise Terrace with Spin Bikes
- Clubroom with Lounge, Billiards and Automated Multimedia Entertainment
- State of the Art Fitness Center and Flex Room
- Adjacent to Mountain View's Village Green Dog Park
- Many Tech-wired Work-from-Home Spaces and Lounges
Pet-passionate Living: Cats and Dogs Welcome (restrictions apply)
555 San Antonio Rd, , Mountain View, CA, 94040
